paragraphs.body: This is a work in progress for what will be the IRC guide, in a different format than what it was last time because it will be easier to read than a wall of text. This page will be a "contents" of the guide. Please Do not protect, move or delete this page with out speaking to me first because it will mess up templates, page linking and other bits of wikicode in pages relating to the IRC guide. If you have any questions, opinions or anything like that, speak to me on IRC or leave a message on my message page.
paragraphs.text: This is a work in progress for what will be the IRC guide, in a different format than what it was last time because it will be easier to read than a wall of text.
